channel.title: Comments on: How to shutdown windows 8
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Dev
item.dc:creator: Dev
item.content:encoded:
Step 1 : Press the power button on your device.

Go to power options > Choose what the power button does > When I press the power button , select Shut down for both battery and plugged in.

You are set.

item.title: By: Anton
item.dc:creator: Anton
item.description: what happens if you press the power button on the computer itself rather than from windows. does that work or is it broken lol.<br /> <br />
item.content:encoded: what happens if you press the power button on the computer itself rather than from windows. does that work or is it broken lol.
